item.title: Inflation is Easing. That's Good News for Consumers and Biden
item.description: Inflation Easing in the US Inflation in the United States eased in May, falling to 4% from 8.6% in April. This is the first time inflation has been below 5% since February 2022. The decline in inflation is likely due to a number of factors, including:
